The Shielding Children's Retinas from Egregious Exposure on the Net (SCREEN) Act would direct the FCC to mandate that all pornographic websites adopt age verification technology to keep children from accessing porn online. The Interstate Obscenity Definition Act (IODA) would establish a nationwide definition of obscenity, reforming the Supreme Court's "Miller Test" and enabling prosecution of obscene content transmitted across states or from foreign countries.
